data.name: Bump Savings
data.description: An account designed to help children kick start their savings. Available for under 18s.

features.additionalInfo: Withdraw funds via free online transfers to your Westpac everyday account, or by visiting a branch (fees apply on an everyday account)
Set up and track up to 6 personalised savings goals via Online Banking

features.additionalValue: Third parties of the Bump account will be able to receive Push Notifications through the Westpac App for incoming and outgoing transfers to the accounts

features.additionalInfo: Statements : 6 monthly, or more frequently on request.
No limit on the number of accounts that customer can hold
See the available balance of up to 3 accounts and transfer money without signing in with Quick Balance.
Track your month-to-month Cash flow and spot areas where you could be making savings with your spend sorted in Categories.
No minimum opening balance for this account

eligibility.additionalInfo: You can open a Bump Savings account for your child as long as they are under 18. For account holders under the age of 14, an account can be opened for a child in the child?s name by a parent, guardian, or grandparent, who must become an authorised signatory at the time of opening the account. There must be at least one authorised signatory on the account. The sole authorised signatory cannot be removed from the account until the child has turned 14 or another authorised signatory is added to the account. For customers 14 years old or over: A child may open an account in their own name. If you are under 12 years old, Parental Control function is mandatory which gives your parent or guardian control of the account. The level of access under Parental Controls can be changed at any time by an authorised signatory or, if you are over 12, by the account holder.

eligibility.additionalValue: You need to have an Australian residential address and currently be in Australia.

fees.name: Online Banking (including Mobile Banking)
fees.additionalInfo: Online transfer withdrawals via Online Banking.

fees.name: Telephone Banking withdrawal (self service)
fees.additionalInfo: Telephone Banking is not available for a parent signatory, and self service Telephone Banking is not available for children under 12.

fees.name: Telephone Banking withdrawal (staff assisted)
fees.additionalInfo: Telephone Banking is not available for a parent signatory, and self service Telephone Banking is not available for children under 12.

depositRates.additionalValue: Bonus interest is payable each month that you: Make a deposit to the account; ensure your account balance is higher at the end than the beginning; and keep your account balance above $0 at all times.
